General.Name: K.B. Recycling Industries Ltd
General.Description: Oceansix Future Paths Ltd. provides solutions based on recycled plastic products in Israel and internationally. The company manufactures and sells trays and packaging products for automotive, agriculture, and beverage industries. It also develops solutions and added-value products from post-consumer recycled plastics, as well as manufactures products related to packaging, container shipping, agriculture, marine farming, and energy storage applications. The company was formerly known as K.B. Recycling Industries Ltd. and changed its name to Oceansix Future Paths Ltd. in May 2023. Oceansix Future Paths Ltd. was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Beit Shean, Israel.
